name: Wallet Runner
description:
A man has dropped his wallet you must catch up to him to give it back!
You have to run as fast as you can by pressing A and D alternating rapidly!

There are five difficulties all requiring faster button mashing. Be sure to post your best scores in the comments!

This game was made in approximately 9 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam. Go donate to their Jingle Jam charity over at Humble.com/yogscast
I used the Foleyship Modifier and like tiny bit of the Editors Modifier considering all graphics are pictures i took.

The entire game development process was streamed live on twitch.tv/fatsheep__

Unfortunately i didn't have the time to add more sounds, music and another cut scene. Might update this further, but no guarantees.
